description: Try our easy to follow Sumac Lamb Cutlets With Feta Fattoush recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sumac Lamb Cutlets With Feta Fattoush
name: Sumac Lamb Cutlets With Feta Fattoush Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine radish, cucumber, tomato, lettuce and feta in a bowl. Drizzle with dressing and toss to combine. Add bread pieces, season to taste and toss to combine. Serve lamb with fattoush.
